DatingApplication

Class ServiceIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatingApplication.ServiceIO

  • public class ServiceIO
extends java.lang.Object
    A Class that handles the Input/Output to the Dating application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServiceIO()
      A default constructor that creates the various lists required by the Application.
      ServiceIO(java.util.LinkedHashMap<Login,Customer> customerList)
      A Constructor that initializes the Customer List and does a Deep copy of the user-defined values to the Customer list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceIO

        public ServiceIO()
        A default constructor that creates the various lists required by the Application.

      • ServiceIO

        public ServiceIO(java.util.LinkedHashMap<Login,Customer> customerList)
          throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException,
                 java.util.InputMismatchException,
                 DatingApplication.UnknownOpException
        A Constructor that initializes the Customer List and does a Deep copy of the user-defined values to the Customer list.
        Parameters:
        customerList - User-defined list that contains the login and customer details of various people
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        DatingApplication.UnknownOpException
        java.util.InputMismatchException

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomer

        public final void addCustomer(Login login,
                              Customer customer)
                       throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException,
                              java.util.InputMismatchException,
                              DatingApplication.UnknownOpException
        A method to add a Customer together with their login details to the added to the Dating service list. This method allows allocates the Customer to the correct list with regards to their denomination. This method is to be called first before any other method.
        Parameters:
        login - a login object provided by the user, containing the Login details
        customer - a customer object provided by the user, containing the customer details
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        java.util.InputMismatchException
        UnknownOpException

      • addAdvertiser

        public void addAdvertiser(Login login,
                          Advertiser advertiser)
        A method to add an Advertiser together with their login details to the added to the Dating service list. This method replaces the Advertiser with the same Login details to the defined by the parameters. Updates the CustomerList as well
        Parameters:
        login - - Login object provided by the user
        advertiser - - Advertiser Object provided by the user

      • addResponder

        public void addResponder(Login login,
                         Responder responder)
        A method to add a Responder together with their login details to the added to the Dating service list. This method replaces the Responder with the same Login details to the defined by the parameters. Updates the CustomerList as well
        Parameters:
        login - - Login object provided by the user
        responder - - Advertiser Object provided by the user

      • removeCustomer

        public void removeCustomer(Login login)
        A method to remove the customer from the System. By using the login details the method is also able to remove the customer from any other list they may have been put in.
        Parameters:
        login - - A login object to indicate the customer that needs to be deleted

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer(Login login)
        A method to return an individual Customer object from the Customer List.
        Parameters:
        login - - A login object to indicate the customer that needs to be returned
        Returns:
        A Customer Object that's associated to the login provided

      • getAdvertiser

        public Advertiser getAdvertiser(Login login)
        A method to return an individual Advertiser object from the Advertiser List.
        Parameters:
        login - - A login object to indicate the Advertiser that needs to be returned
        Returns:
        An Advertiser Object that's associated to the login provided

      • getResponder

        public Responder getResponder(Login login)
        A method to return an individual Responder object from the Responder List.
        Parameters:
        login - - A login object to indicate the responder that needs to be returned
        Returns:
        A Responder Object that's associated to the login provided

      • loginAuth

        public boolean loginAuth(Login login)
        A method to authenticate the Customer/Advertiser/Responder and allow access to the Dating service.
        Parameters:
        login - - A login object that is to be authenticated
        Returns:
        false if the Login details don't match, otherwise true

      • defaultPassWord

        public java.lang.String defaultPassWord(Customer customer)
        A method to return a default password to the Customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - - A customer object that will require the default password
        Returns:
        A string literal indicating the default password for a customer

        public void getMatches(Responder responder,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Advertiser> matches)
                throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        A method to return a list of advertiser matches that match a given responder.
        Parameters:
        responder - - A responder object to be used to get the advertiser matches
        matches -
        Throws:

      • sendReply

        public void sendReply(Responder responder,
                      java.lang.String replyFromResponder,
                      Advertiser advertiser)
               throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        A method to enable a responder to send a reply to an Advertiser.
        Parameters:
        responder - - A responder object that is sending the reply message
        replyFromResponder - - A string literal indicating the reply from the responder
        advertiser - - An advertiser object at which the reply message from the responder is intended to
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

      • viewReplies

        public java.util.ArrayList<ReplyMessage> viewReplies(Login login)
        A method to return a list containing all the replies an Advertiser may have gotten.
        Parameters:
        login - - A login object that can be used to get the replies
        Returns:
        a list containing ReplyMessage Objects.

      • getAllAdvertisers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Advertiser> getAllAdvertisers()
        A method to return a list of all Advertiser in the Dating service.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all the Advertiser's in the system

      • getAllResponders

        A method to return a list of all Responder in the Dating service.
        Returns:
